text:
親愛的星展客戶 Ｌ＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊Ａ 您好：
本信件附上您的『信用卡電子對帳單』，請參閱。 同時也歡迎您登入DBS Card+信用卡數位/行動服務APP 以了解更多信用卡服務內容，包含更新個人資料、開卡、繳信用卡款、查詢消費明細等功能。 若您對於本行服務或產品有任何疑問。 請洽分行或致電客服專線[redacted_number]，謝謝。
trans:
Dear DBS Customer, L＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊A,
This email includes your "Credit Card E-Statement." Please review it. You are also invited to log in to the DBS Card+ credit card digital/mobile service app to explore more credit card services, including updating personal information, activating your card, paying your credit card bill, and checking transaction details. If you have any questions about our services or products, please visit a branch or contact our customer service hotline at [redacted_number]. Thank you.
